name: Squirrel Wallet
description: Squirrel Wallet is a premier multi-EVM Web3 wallet that seamlessly integrates DeFi, tokenized real-world assets (RWAs), and digital ID solutions. With Guardians-enabled recoverable wallets, one-click integrations, and multi-chain support, Squirrel Wallet provides a comprehensive platform for both newcomers and experienced users. By offering fully asset-backed RWA tokenization, secure digital ID verification, and real-time asset transparency, Squirrel Wallet empowers users to trade, verify, and manage their assets efficiently. With its secure, decentralized architecture, Squirrel is rapidly becoming the go-to platform for crypto enthusiasts, institutional investors, and commodity traders. The wallet simplifies crypto transactions, lowers fees, and enhances security, while capitalizing on the projected $15 trillion RWA market by 2030.
